article_title: Doctors Have Barriers To End-Of-Life Discussions Despite Medicare Coverage

article_metadata.description: Physicians are beginning to understand the Medicare benefit that allows them to bill for end-of-life care conversations, but a new poll shows there’s a need for more education because about half say they are unsure about what to say in these consultations.
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Physicians are beginning to understand the Medicare benefit that allows them to bill for end-of-life care conversations, but a new poll shows there’s a need for more education because about half say they are unsure about what to say in these consultations.
